website_summaries.verdict: Quick to absorb in one's system and creates fast-acting results.
pros: Positive reviews for this supplement's ability to improve sleep
Reports of high quality at a price point many can afford
May reduce the effects of insomnia and other sleep-related conditions
cons: Reviews don't suggest many benefits beyond improved sleep

customer_reviews.title: Works good for my restless legs
customer_reviews.text: Stated out at 300 mg a bit too much for me , dropped to 100 mg —2 hours prior to bed . Recall mag blocks certain meds - always check with dr prior to taking any vitamin or other over counter meds. Works fine for my restless legs . Also think it helps my asthma.
customer_reviews.author: jilly

customer_reviews.title: sleep like a baby
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Magnesium for 2 years now. I have bought all different brands that cost 3 times more than this one. I was skeptical when comparing the price, but tried it in my sister house and felt in love with this one. Help me sleep like a baby. I bought 2 bottles and will keep using this brand. Excellent price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Rosario Arvelo

customer_reviews.title: Purchased wrong one
customer_reviews.text: Could not fall asleep after taking this. I think I was supposed to buy the plain magnesium.
customer_reviews.author: bunny mama ♥️

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnant ladies!
customer_reviews.text: OB recommended this to be while pregnant for sleep, constipation and nerve issues. It has worked like a dream! I take 1 100 mg pill in the am and one in the pm.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K Ruddle

customer_reviews.title: Finr
customer_reviews.text: I need to take this so I have only been able to get it on line. I am thankful..
customer_reviews.author: Mary M McCauley

customer_reviews.title: These smell funny
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work as well as the ones of the same brand that I buy at WalMart, but they have an odd smell. I hope I’m not ingesting something that I shouldn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think they help my sleeping...
customer_reviews.text: will continue to use these at bedtime for better sleep
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed by how well this works for me. Also amazed by the price. I'll be ordering more!!!
customer_reviews.author: BOOT

customer_reviews.title: good supplement
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help with some stomach issues. The supplement has helped and also helps me sleep better at night.
customer_reviews.author: likes to shop

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I take it late for a good night's sleep, my body feels flexible & loose in the morning... good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Thorazine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my restless legs and it really helped. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I use Feverfew, D3, Magneisum, B12, and B2 to help with my cluster headaches. I have tried many brands off amazon, Natures Way, spring valley, puritans pride, etc and all perform very well for me. I haven't had a cluster headache since starting the regiment over a year ago. would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SMCairns

customer_reviews.title: Quick and gentle solution.
customer_reviews.text: This product lets us titrate what we need only when we need it for our physical challenges, side effects of meds or iron supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Susan SH

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kids headaches
customer_reviews.text: My kids get bad migraines and the Magnesium Citrate seems to help them some.
customer_reviews.author: Sabella

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best magnesium, but I found I could order it from Walmart at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: bekkitom

customer_reviews.title: Like that it is the CITRATE KIND
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and taken the Spring Valley brand magnesium citrate in the past. However, when I ran out of my last bottle our local discount store did not have this in stock, so I purchased it from Amazon. I like the fact this magnesium supplement has citrate as it is supposedly more absorbable. I sometimes get leg cramps at night so I take prior to bedtime and also have read that magnesium can supposedly help to facilitate more restful sleep. I have to say on the nights I take it prior to bed I do seem to feel more relaxed at times.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: 2x as much as I paid elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product (mag citrate is the easiest form to absorb). It's half the price at Walmart, though.
customer_reviews.author: *Snake*Charmer*

customer_reviews.title: The only one I buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Spring Valley magnesium citrate for years. The quality is good and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great for IBS
customer_reviews.text: I have IBS and CC. This is a life savor. A more natural way to keep me regular. Works every time. It does not seem to make me sleepy though, so I take it at any point during the day when my stomach is acting up. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: gracie abel

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like these for the laxative effect. These are good. Walmart sells this for less than half the cost listed here.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just one pill at night will give you a resting sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Castro

customer_reviews.title: I accidentally spilled my bottle in the sink, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally spilled my bottle in the sink, and instead of picking each out i figured i'd let them dissolve and wash down the sink....24 hour later they are just as hard as a rock. So the nurse in me thought "well it needs stomach acid to break it down" so i put it in warm vinegar and 24 hours later no change. RAPID RELEASE MY ^&%!!! If digestion is normal it should pass out of your system in 12 to 24 hours. NO BUENO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather C
